pages.text: Mood of a Timeship generally doesn't affect much. The things it does do is, affect the lighting, low mood leads to cold light, high to warm light.

The mood is generally devided into 5 types, in order from highest mood to lowest: Ecstatic(100), Happy(90), Content(50), Apathetic(0), Discontent(-50), Sad(-100). $(br) When the mood is at/below Apathetic, there will be 100b block randomization on landing
pages.title: Mood Levels
